title: The Raspberry Ranger
author: Callum S.
description: When a mysterious fruit grants ordinary librarian Sam powers beyond imagination, the Raspberry Ranger is born. Follow Sam as they protect Berry City from the villainous Sourpatch.

title: Cosmic Drift
author: Jasper R.
description: A lone pilot drifts through the remnants of a collapsed galaxy, searching for a signal that could lead humanity to a new home.

title: Bone Hollow
author: Callum S.
description: In the forgotten town of Bone Hollow, the dead don't stay buried. A young mortician must uncover the truth before the next full moon.

title: The Raspberry Ranger
author: Callum S.
description: Sourpatch returns with an army of citrus soldiers. The Raspberry Ranger must team up with an unlikely ally — the Blueberry Brawler.

title: Neon Ronin
author: Jasper R.
description: In a rain-soaked cyberpunk Tokyo, a disgraced samurai-turned-hacker fights corporate overlords with a plasma katana and righteous fury.

title: Cosmic Drift
author: Jasper R.
description: The signal leads to an alien megastructure. But the crew of the Perseverance isn't alone — something ancient is watching.

title: Wildbloom
author: Callum S.
description: A botanical witch tends her enchanted garden at the edge of the world. Each flower holds a memory — and some memories bite back.

title: Neon Ronin
author: Jasper R.
description: The mega-corp Zaibatsu has unleashed a digital plague. The Ronin must jack into the mainframe and face a ghost from his past.
